primary.description: Deep Teal - Primary brand color. Intelligence, innovation, trust.

primaryLight.description: Lighter teal for hover states and highlights

primaryDark.description: Darker teal for pressed states and emphasis

secondary.description: Warm Amber - Secondary brand. Energy, community, warmth.

100.description: Very light gray - elevated surfaces (light mode)

800.description: Very dark gray - elevated surfaces (dark mode)

primary.description: Primary accent - alias for interactive.primary (brand teal)

hover.description: Accent hover state - for hover effects on primary accent

fill.description: Very light teal tint - same for all depths. Light enough to see nested content.

stroke.description: Medium teal for circle boundary definition

fill.description: Brand primary - roles stand out against light circle backgrounds

text.description: White text on role circles for maximum contrast

stroke.description: White stroke for subtle glow/ring effect

onCircle.description: Dark teal-tinted text on light circle backgrounds

onCircleStroke.description: Light stroke behind dark text for readability

selected.description: Selected state background - uses brand primary with alpha

fill.description: Circle fill - light teal tint (light) / dark teal (dark)

text.description: Role text - white on light mode, dark on dark mode

sans.value: 'Plus Jakarta Sans', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif
sans.description: Primary sans-serif - Plus Jakarta Sans: modern, geometric, friendly yet professional

heading.value: 'Plus Jakarta Sans', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif
heading.description: Headings - Same font, use heavier weights (600-700) for hierarchy

mono.value: 'JetBrains Mono', 'SF Mono', Consolas, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace
mono.description: Monospace - JetBrains Mono: excellent coding font with ligatures

serif.value: Merriweather, Georgia, Cambria, 'Times New Roman', serif
serif.description: Serif - Merriweather: elegant, readable long-form content

y.description: Button vertical padding (8px - compact, matches input height)

gap.description: Gap between button icon and text

icon.description: Square padding for icon-only buttons (md/lg sizes - 10px)

x.description: Small button horizontal padding (10px - sleek with good readability)

y.description: Small button vertical padding (2px - ultra-sleek like Linear, minimal)

gap.description: Gap between icon and text for small buttons (2px - very tight, crisp)

iconRight.description: Padding-right for inputs with right-side icons (24px - optimized for icon 2px from edge)

gap.description: Gap between major sections (24px - compact, Linear-inspired)

mb.description: Margin below major sections (24px - compact, Linear-inspired)

gap.description: Gap between form fields (12px - compact, Linear-inspired)

sectionGap.description: Gap between content sections (24px - matches section gaps)

mb.description: Margin below section headers (12px - compact title-to-content gap)

pr.description: Chip close button right padding (4px) - closer to edge for compact design

x.description: Small badge horizontal padding (8px) - wider for better readability

y.description: Small badge vertical padding (1px) - ultra-thin, pill-shaped

x.description: Medium badge horizontal padding (6px) - default badge size
Large badge horizontal padding (8px) - prominent badges

y.description: Large badge vertical padding (4px) - more breathing room
Item vertical padding (8px) - menu items, card rows, settings rows, nav items
Section header vertical padding (10px) - section labels, group titles, category headers

my.description: Divider vertical margin (8px above + below) - separators, section breaks

xs.description: Extra small all-sides (4px) - compact menus, tight containers
Extra small vertical (4px) - compact menu containers

sm.description: Soft card elevation - buttons, small cards

xl.description: Extra large - full modals, command palettes

inner.description: Subtle inset shadow - pressed states, inputs

glow.description: Soft glow effect - focus states, highlights

focusRing.description: Focus ring glow - uses brand teal at low opacity for subtle, accessible focus indication
